item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Welcome to ByteBuoy ðŸ‘‹ Introduction Welcome to ByteBuoy, an open-source Artefact & File Monitoring solution. ByteBuoy is designed to streamline the process of monitoring, copying, and moving files and artefacts, offering an intuitive Web application to track the status of these operations.
